summary:
- **Security Issuance**: 29,333,333 new quoted options (exercise price: AUD 0.10, expiry: 31 Dec 2029).  
- **Issue Structure**:  
  - 17,333,333 free-attaching options.  
  - 12,000,000 issued as part of joint lead manager fees (implied value: AUD 0.039 per option).  
- **Purpose**: Raise working capital (placement-related).  
- **Reference**: Terms detailed in Appendix 3B lodged 2 July 2025 (linked).  
- **Post-Issuance Capital**: Total quoted options (new class) will be 29,333,333; existing ordinary shares (PNN) at 144,369,403.  

*Omitted: Legal boilerplate, non-material capital breakdowns.*
